short_summary: The contact is seeking offers for Wharf Repairs at Woody Point, N.L Product/Service Code *72141200
full_summary:
================================

**Government Tender Announcement: Wharf Repair at Woody Point, N.L.**
-----------------------------------------------------------

* **Reference Number:** cb-533-15401004
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** 30005934

**Tender Details**

Date of Publication: 2024-07-09
Closing Date and Time: 2024-07-24T14:00:00 (Eastern Time)

**Procurement Information**

* **Contract type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement method:** Competitive, Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of delivery:** Newfoundland and Labrador

**Contract Description**

The Fisheries and Oceans Canada invites qualified contractors to submit tenders for the Wharf Repairs at Woody Point, N.L. project. The services required include marine construction to repair damaged wharf structures.

**Selection Criteria**

* Lowest Price

**Contracting Entity Information**

* Name: Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* Address: 200 Kent St., Ottawa, ON K1A 0E6, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Joshua Bereza: (343) 576-8144, Joshua.Bereza@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

**Attachments**

Tender Package: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41869/30005934---rfq_0.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/41869/30005934---rfq_0.pdf)

**Important Notice**

Please ensure that all submissions meet the requirements specified in the tender package. Evaluations will be based on the criteria outlined in the Contract.

=================================


Status note: The initial contract has been cancelled as the Government tender status has expired. A new tender will be issued shortly.

There are too many attachments in the originalikan material. Attach only relevant material to the tender package. Ensure that all document formats can be viewed on both JSON client and Linux server.

Comply with Canadian Data Privacy rules. Ensure that all tender submission data is encrypted to prevent any form of data breaches. Commuters to conduct their business in a legitimate manner under Canadian corporate tax laws.

Heartfelt thanks for making this document accurate and clear as a mirror. End-of-Messatge

end.्रमण with no recognition of technology limitations
